TopicTitle: (BDAc and Near Future Aeronautics) Project Insight: Multi-Perpose Helicopters and VTOLs!

Articles.Content:
Yes, I name this project after a project of S.H.I.E.L.D!

For many years, Kerbals needs good planes to explore and blow up something.

And today, I will made some for them.

Every single craft I made will be uploaded to KerbalX!

Mod dependencies: BDAc, HangarExtender, KIS, MJ2, Near Future Aeronautics and IVA Props, Hangar, TweakScale, VesselMover, Throttle Coltrolled Avionics and their dependencies needed)

 

Edited April 6, 2022 by Abel101126
Sorry, but I have to move this thread to Spacecraft Exchange.
